sen.e: It is said that in the Meiji period, he made efforts to restore impaired reputation of his comrades, whom worked together with him and died in battle, and visited their bereaved families in various places to offer his apologetic sentiment and condolence.

sen.j: 大正天皇の生誕の際の御用掛や結婚の際には、御婚儀御用掛長を務めた。
sen.e: He took charge of the general affaires at the birth of Emperor Taisho as Goyogakari (a general affaires official of the Imperial Household), as well as, at his marriage as the head of Goyogakari in charge of the marriage ceremony.

sen.j: 徳川慶喜の公爵授与に尽力し、徳川慶喜の娘を大正天皇の后候補として推した。
sen.e: At the conferment of the title of duke to Yoshinobu TOKUGAWA, he made a great effort, and he pushed the daughter of Yoshinobu TOKUGAWA for the candidate of the empress of Emperor Taisho.
He made a great effort for Yoshinobu TOKUGAWA to be conferred the title of duke, and he pushed the daughter of Yoshinobu TOKUGAWA to the candidate for the empress of Emperor Taisho.
He worked very hard to have the title of duke conferred on Yoshinobu TOKUGAWA, and he proposed that the daughter of Yoshinobu TOKUGAWA be considered as a candidate to become Emperor Taisho's empress.

sen.j: 佐々木高行と下田歌子主導の皇女教育の方針に異議のあった明治天皇・昭憲皇太后夫妻の意思で、敬三がその牽制役を担ったこともあった。
sen.e: Upon the wish of Emperor Meiji and his wife Empress Dowager Shoken, who were against the educational policy of their princes and princesses lead by Takayuki SASAKI and Utako SHIMODA, Keizo once took charge of a deterrent function against them.
sen.cmt: 明治天皇・昭憲皇太后夫妻→Emperor Meiji and his wife Empress Dowager Shoken としました。
sen.e: When Emperor Meiji and his wife Empress Dowager Shoken felt opposed to the educational policy of their princes and princesses lead by Takayuki SASAKI and Utako SHIMODA, Keizo played a role as deterrent to the policy by the wish of Emperor and Empress.

Emperor Meiji and his wife the Empress Shoken were opposed to the educational policies championed by Takayuki SASAKI and Utako SHIMODA over how to educate imperial princes and princesses, and in accordance with their wishes, Keizo worked to obstruct Sasaki and Shimoda's policies.
